name: 趙莊敏
objective: 本課程可使學生瞭解：貨幣與資金市場、投資問題、如何取得資金與運用資金、使公司價值最大、使股東權益最大化、瞭解代理制度、瞭解公司股票、債務之利用，股利政策等事項?
schedule:
1. Introduction
2. Finance and the Financial Manager
3. Agency Problem
4. Time Value of Money
5. Valuing Bonds
6. Valuing Stocks
7-9 Minicase Discussions
10. NPV and Other Investment Criteria
11. Making Investment Decisions with the NPV Rules
12. Risk, Return, and Opportunity cost of Capital
13. Capital Budgeting and Risk
14~18. Journal Paper discussions
scorePolicy:
minicase 20%
期中報告 40%
期末報告 40%
materials: Brealey, Myers, and Allen, ”Principles of Corporate Finance”, 12th ed., 華泰文化事業公司代理。
